summary.para: References the callback method to be called when the asynchronous operation is completed.

content.para: The result of the asynchronous operation.

T:System.AsyncCallback provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous operation. This callback delegate is supplied to the client when the asynchronous operation is initiated. The event handler referenced by T:System.AsyncCallback contains program logic to finish processing the asynchronous task for the client.
T:System.AsyncCallback uses the T:System.IAsyncResult interface to obtain the status of the asynchronous operation.
